title: Büyük Bedesten Wall Fort
description: A fort abutting the Anastasian Wall, 5km west of Çiftlikköy Merkez and 6km northeast of Gümüşpınar in Turkey.

properties.description: Representative point location for rough centerpoint of the visible landforms. Location identified with reference to Crow 2002.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Büyük Bedesten Wall Fort
